ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron looked at Unitron. You will not harm anymore Decepticons, how dare you strike him form behind. Megatron furiously said. He slowly began to walk

Megatron looked at Unitron. "You will not harm anymore Decepticons, how
dare you strike him form behind." Megatron furiously said. He slowly
began to walk forward towards Unitron. "I am power that has existed for
over an eon." he kept walking towards Unitron "My name strikes fear into
any Autobot or Maximal of any era." he kept advancing slowly. "I am the
Slagmaker."
